# Ship Infra

## About
Ship Infra is an open source project with 8 comprehensive tutorials for deploying modern applications on AWS.

## Tutorials
1. Getting Started with AWS
2. EC2 Instance Deployment
3. S3 Storage & Static Hosting
4. RDS Database Setup
5. VPC & Networking
6. Load Balancers & Auto Scaling
7. CI/CD with CodePipeline
8. Infrastructure as Code

## Links
- Documentation: https://www.ship-infra.com/docs/v1-beginner-infrastructure-as-code
- GitHub: https://github.com/Ship-Infra/ship-infra-project
